summary: This Q&A report reviews standardized testing practices in the Department of Defense's school system. DOD operates schools around the world, primarily for military families. Like public schools, DOD schools administer standardized tests. Our study found that students in DOD schools spent more time on average taking standardized tests compared to students in 9 school districts near military bases. A DOD working group has found ways...
title: K–12 Education: Better Planning Could Help DOD Schools Implement Changes to Standardized Testing
